item.title: Worker dies as pipe falls on him at YTPS?site in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur, Jan 28: A worker died after a huge pipe came crashing down on him from a crane at the Yermaras?Thermal Power Station (YTPS) site near Raichur on Tuesday. Hundreds of workers and local residents, enraged by the incident, went on a rampage and ransacked the office at the plant site.
The deceased has been identified as Mahesh (27), a native of Uttar Pradesh. The accident occurred at 12 noon when a crane was lowering a huge pipe at the work site. The chain, which was fastened to the pipe, ...]]>
